name: Samantha No More
description:
IMPORTANT!: When playing, make sure you turn your sound all the way down before you open the application, it can get very loud if you're wearing earphones. Currently working on a fix for that issue!

Samantha No More is a 3D Atmospheric puzzle game. You play as Jeremy, as he navigates through an old abandoned house, trying to uncover what has happened to his friend Samantha. 

This is a student game that was built in 6 weeks by a sole developer utilizing external assets.
